Posts.Content: Apr 15, 2016 08:27AM Blessed247 wrote: So glad hear your wonderful news. As you stated before reading others post is so helpful. I am 46 and like you I am not fond of doctors, but went for my wellness checkup & mammogram never dreaming they would never see anything. Had my first mammogram on a Wednesday got a call on Monday to be back Tuesday. After the second mammogram the Doctor reading it came in and recommended getting on top of it and scheduled a biopsy. I will go on Tuesday the 18th. The waiting is so hard
Posts.Title: very stupid question from 66 year old female framer
